mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Users (user_account, user_password, user_name, user_email, user_profile, user_address, user_birth) VALUES (#{userAccount}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userProfile}, #{userAddress}, #{userBirth})
mapper.select: SELECT user_account , user_password , user_name , user_email , user_profile , user_address , user_birth , user_role , create_at , user_point FROM Users WHERE user_account = #{account}
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM Users WHERE user_account=#{userAccount}
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM Users WHERE user_email=#{email}
